subject_terms_3: Photography National Museum of Singapore (Place) National monuments
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a large building with a dome that is decorated with panels around its circumference. It is multi-storey and to the left of the photograph, a couple of pediments capping the building's fa√ßade can be seen. There are numerous windows on the second and first floors, as well as arches on the first floor. In front of the museum is a street whereby a car, several people, and a traffic light are present.
title_text: National Museum of Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
